topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55325c3c6368726518771c00#post_55325c3c6368726518771c00
I've been seeing the therapist for a while. Back in around November, I started hearing voices call out to me, so after a while, I went to go see him.
Tuesday, the causes of these voices were narrowed down to two possibilities. First, and what he said was most likely, it might be from high anxiety.

The second, though, is a lot more serious, and he only thinks I don't have it because there's no history of mental illness in my family.
I might have psychosis, which is a disconnect from reality. I took a look at the symptoms, and I have a lot of them: anxiety, paranoia, hearing voices, aggression, and a lot more. It's caused by a lot of stress happening at once.
topics.author: 5201b5c0a4c72d0d9b0001e4

topics.body:
"@toxicrystal":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55325e1d6368726407840200#post_55325e1d6368726407840200
Shit man. Did he put you on any medications?
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55325ed46368726e22c00200#post_55325ed46368726e22c00200
Not yet. I'm going to be seeing a specialist soon to figure out exactly what it is.
I'm scared. I don't want to be labeled psychotic for the rest of my life.
topics.author: 5201b5c0a4c72d0d9b0001e4

topics.body:
"@toxicrystal":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55325f0e6368723355af1100#post_55325f0e6368723355af1100

At least it's not cancer. I hope you get better.

"@toxicrystal":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55325f0e6368723355af1100#post_55325f0e6368723355af1100
Just take a deep breath man. You'll be fine. You bring any more stress onto yourself and you're only gonna make it worse.

topics.body:
I like to imagine that Satan is God's subordinate and acts like a warden to Hell, which was actually a prison. 
Also, I reject the idea of eternal punishment but instead believe that Hell torments the sinned to teach them a lesson and when they finally learned that lesson, not through fear, hate or pain but through understanding and peace, they will receive their place in Heaven.
I also believe that the Universe is not eternal but existence is and once the Universe ends, a new one will be made with different laws and moral beliefs.

Take that, religion!
